name: Gun Raiders
abstract: Gun Raiders is a free-to-play VR shooter!  Chat with friends while you mow down enemies in multiple game modes while jetpacking through the air or climbing from wall to wall monkey-style!

detail.app_release_note:
Enter the Outland: Season 10!

New
• Season 10 Outlands Region with another 100 tiers of loot and up to 500 Free Raider Coins
• Outland Maps - Conquer the monolithic CRATER Battle Royale, capture victory in the chaotic TRUCK Capture the Flag, and control the action in the hectic VAULT Control.
• Cut through enemies with the Scythe, leeching health and firing powerful Moon Blades.
• PvE Hub Events - Defend the hub in Bot Storm, perfect your aim in Target Frenzy, and dominate the room in Point Control.
• Bundles + Deals section in the hub offer discounts on Raider Coins and Item Shop items.
• Exclusive Chokuto Katana Skin Bundle - This is our first ever weapon skin that uses a new model for the weapon and will be an exclusive to the bundle and never go into the Item Shop.
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Pro
